past_courses.course_name: Quantum Mechanics for Scientists and Engineers
past_courses.justification: Introduces core quantum mechanical principles, wave functions, and operator methods foundational to PC2130B.
Provides linear algebra tools required for state vector and operator representations in quantum mechanics.

direct_oulu_links.justification: Direct content overlap with introductory quantum mechanics topics studied in PC2130B.
Continuation and deeper quantum theory aligned with PC2130B advanced topics.
Mathematical methods (differential equations, vector spaces) support quantum formulation.
